content: level up your garter stitch with this fun and easy diagonal knit scarf this project is perfect for the adventurous beginner wanting to step away from the very basic first projects often suggested i ve linked the yarn i used for the photo but the beauty of this pattern is it will work with any weight yarn as long as you adjust your needle size to the requirement for the yarn you re using guage is not important for this project there is a link to the youtube tutorial at the bottom of the pattern
